hero.label: Workshop
hero.title: AI Literate
hero.subtitle: Build shared understanding of what AI can and cannot do. Leave with a clear plan for your first pilot.

definition.label: What is AI Literacy?
definition.title: The ability to evaluate, apply, and govern AI tools within your organization.
definition.description: AI Literacy is not about becoming a developer. It is about building the judgment to know when AI is the right tool, what it can realistically accomplish, and how to implement it responsibly within your workflows.
outcomes: Evaluate AI tools without vendor hype
Set realistic expectations for AI projects

notForItems: Teams looking for slide decks and theory
Anyone expecting AI to replace their team
Organizations without real workflows to improve

modality.label: Workshop Modality
modality.title: Structured, interactive, outcome-focused.
modality.description: This is not a presentation. We bring your team together to work through real material. You bring the workflows, the frustrations, and the questions. We bring structure, AI fluency, and facilitation.

items.title: AI Capability Map
items.description: A clear picture of what AI can and cannot do for your specific use cases.

items.title: Workflow Audit
items.description: Your existing processes mapped with AI opportunity zones highlighted.

items.title: Pilot Recommendation
items.description: One concrete use case ready for a 24-hour proof-of-concept build.

items.title: Shared Vocabulary
items.description: Your team aligned on AI terminology and realistic expectations.

cta.label: Ready to Build AI Literacy?
cta.title: Register for the next session.
cta.description: Upcoming sessions are listed on Luma. Secure your team's spot.

feedback.confidenceQuestion: How confident do you feel using AI tools after this workshop?
feedback.valuableQuestion: What was the most valuable part of the workshop for you?
feedback.planQuestion: What is one thing you plan to build or improve using AI?
feedback.emailHelper: Only if you want us to follow up or send the downloads.
